org.apache.plc4x.java.scraper

Class ScraperTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.plc4x.java.scraper.ScraperTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ScraperTask
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Plc Scraper Task that scrapes one source. One ScrapeJob gets split into multiple tasks. One task for each source that is defined in the JobConfiguration.
